name: Special Reserve Lonsdale
additionalNotes: This cigar is made exclusively from Sun Grown Tobacco. It features a complex blend of Long Filler tobaccos: Nicaraguan Seco, Viso,Jalapa Ligero, Costa Rican Ligero and Seco. The wrapper and binder are of Habana 2000 seed origin. A Medium/Strong body Blend cigar that produces taste and aroma characteristics similar to the famous Cuban cigars.
